languages.text: "Но я могла защищать свой дом и встретить конец вместе с остальными!" {n}Ирлиэт вздрагивает от собственных слов, озираясь на освежеванные тела братьев и сестер.{/n} "Впрочем, до тех пор, пока живо хоть одно дитя Крудараха, память о нем не исчезнет. А я... я еще не закончила свой путь. Посаженное однажды зерно еще не проросло цветком истины".

traits.locale_text: "Но я могла защищать свой дом и встретить конец вместе с остальными!" {n}Ирлиэт вздрагивает от собственных слов, озираясь на освежованные тела братьев и сестер.{/n} "Впрочем, до тех пор, пока живо хоть одно дитя Крудараха, память о нем не исчезнет. А я... я еще не закончила свой путь. Посаженное однажды зерно еще не проросло цветком истины".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "But I could have protected my home and met my end alongside the others!" {n}Yrliet's own words make her shudder as she stares at the flayed bodies of her brothers and sisters.{/n} "Still, for as long as at least one child of Crudarach is alive, its memory will not vanish. And I... am yet to reach the end of my Path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of truth."
languages.original_text: "Но я могла защищать свой дом и встретить конец вместе с остальными!" {n}Ирлиэт вздрагивает от собственных слов, озираясь на освежеванные тела братьев и сестер.{/n} "Впрочем, до тех пор, пока живо хоть одно дитя Крудараха, память о нем не исчезнет. А я... я еще не закончила свой путь. Посаженное однажды зерно еще не проросло цветком истины".

And I... am yet to reach the end of my path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of the truth."

And I... am yet to reach the end of my path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of the truth."

And I... am yet to reach the end of my Path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of truth."

traits.locale_text: "But I could have protected my home and met my end alongside the others!" {n}Yrliet's own words make her shudder as she stares at the flayed bodies of her brothers and sisters.{/n} "Still, for as long as at least one child of Crudarach is alive, its memory will not vanish. And I... am yet to reach the end of my Path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of truth."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¡Pero podría haber defendido mi hogar y perecido junto a los demás!». {n}Yrliet se estremece al oír sus propias palabras mientras contempla los cadáveres desollados de sus hermanos y hermanas.{/n} «Pero mientras quede al menos una hija de Crudarach con vida, su recuerdo no se desvanecerá. Y yo... aún no he llegado al final de mi senda. La simiente, plantada hace ya tiempo, todavía ha de germinar hasta que brote la flor de la verdad».
languages.original_text: "But I could have protected my home and met my end alongside the others!" {n}Yrliet's own words make her shudder as she stares at the flayed bodies of her brothers and sisters.{/n} "Still, for as long as at least one child of Crudarach is alive, its memory will not vanish. And I... am yet to reach the end of my Path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of truth."

traits.locale_text: «¡Pero podría haber defendido mi hogar y perecido junto a los demás!». {n}Yrliet se estremece al oír sus propias palabras mientras contempla los cadáveres desollados de sus hermanos y hermanas.{/n} «Pero mientras quede al menos una hija de Crudarach con vida, su recuerdo no se desvanecerá. Y yo... aún no he llegado al final de mi senda. La simiente, plantada hace ya tiempo, todavía ha de germinar hasta que brote la flor de la verdad».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「だが私は故郷を守り、同胞たちと一緒に最期を迎えることもできていたのに！」{n}兄弟姉妹の皮膚を剥がされた遺体を見つめながら、ユリエットは自分の言葉に身震いする。{/n}「それでも、クルダラの子供が一人でも生きている限り、その記憶が消えることはない。そして私は…まだ道の終わりに到達していない。はるか昔に植えられた種は、未だ芽吹き、真実の花を咲かせるに至っていないのだ」
languages.original_text: "But I could have protected my home and met my end alongside the others!" {n}Yrliet's own words make her shudder as she stares at the flayed bodies of her brothers and sisters.{/n} "Still, for as long as at least one child of Crudarach is alive, its memory will not vanish. And I... am yet to reach the end of my Path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of truth."

traits.locale_text: 「だが私は故郷を守り、同胞たちと一緒に最期を迎えることもできていたのに！」{n}兄弟姉妹の皮膚を剥がされた遺体を見つめながら、ユリエットは自分の言葉に身震いする。{/n}「それでも、クルダラの子供が一人でも生きている限り、その記憶が消えることはない。そして私は…まだ道の終わりに到達していない。はるか昔に植えられた種は、未だ芽吹き、真実の花を咲かせるに至っていないのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “但我至少可以努力保护我的家园，与其他人同生共死！”{n}说完这句话之后，伊莉耶特颤抖了一下，凝视着她兄弟姐妹们被剥了皮的尸体。{/n}“不过，只要克鲁达拉赫还有一位子嗣活着，它的记忆就不会消失。而我……我还没有走到道途的终点。很久以前种下的种子，还没有开出真理之花。”
languages.original_text: "But I could have protected my home and met my end alongside the others!" {n}Yrliet's own words make her shudder as she stares at the flayed bodies of her brothers and sisters.{/n} "Still, for as long as at least one child of Crudarach is alive, its memory will not vanish. And I... am yet to reach the end of my Path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of truth."

traits.locale_text: “但我至少可以努力保护我的家园，与其他人同生共死！”{n}说完这句话之后，伊莉耶特颤抖了一下，凝视着她兄弟姐妹们被剥了皮的尸体。{/n}“不过，只要克鲁达拉赫还有一位子嗣活着，它的记忆就不会消失。而我……我还没有走到道途的终点。很久以前种下的种子，还没有开出真理之花。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mais j'aurais pu protéger mon monde et mourir aux côtés des autres ! » {n}Yrliet frémit à ses propres mots alors qu'elle fixe du regard les corps écorchés de ses frères et sœurs.{/n} « Pourtant, tant qu'il reste au moins un enfant de Crudarach, son souvenir ne s'évanouira pas. Et pour ma part... je n'ai pas encore atteint la fin de ma Voie. La graine, plantée il y a bien longtemps, doit encore grandir et produire la fleur de la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "But I could have protected my home and met my end alongside the others!" {n}Yrliet's own words make her shudder as she stares at the flayed bodies of her brothers and sisters.{/n} "Still, for as long as at least one child of Crudarach is alive, its memory will not vanish. And I... am yet to reach the end of my Path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of truth."

traits.locale_text: « Mais j'aurais pu protéger mon monde et mourir aux côtés des autres ! » {n}Yrliet frémit à ses propres mots alors qu'elle fixe du regard les corps écorchés de ses frères et sœurs.{/n} « Pourtant, tant qu'il reste au moins un enfant de Crudarach, son souvenir ne s'évanouira pas. Et pour ma part... je n'ai pas encore atteint la fin de ma Voie. La graine, plantée il y a bien longtemps, doit encore grandir et produire la fleur de la vérité. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Aber ich hätte mein Zuhause beschützen und zusammen mit den anderen den Tod finden können!" {n}Yrliets eigene Worte lassen sie schaudern, während sie auf die zerfetzten Körper ihrer Brüder und Schwestern starrt.{/n} "Aber solange auch nur ein einziges Kind von Crudarach noch lebt, wird die Erinnerung an Crudarach nicht verschwinden. Und ich ... ich habe noch nicht das Ende meines Pfads erreicht. Die Saat, die vor langer Zeit in die Erde gebracht wurde, muss sich noch entwickeln und die Blume der Wahrheit erst hervorbringen."
languages.original_text: "But I could have protected my home and met my end alongside the others!" {n}Yrliet's own words make her shudder as she stares at the flayed bodies of her brothers and sisters.{/n} "Still, for as long as at least one child of Crudarach is alive, its memory will not vanish. And I... am yet to reach the end of my Path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of truth."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich hätte mein Zuhause beschützen und zusammen mit den anderen den Tod finden können!" {n}Yrliets eigene Worte lassen sie schaudern, während sie auf die zerfetzten Körper ihrer Brüder und Schwestern starrt.{/n} "Aber solange auch nur ein einziges Kind von Crudarach noch lebt, wird die Erinnerung an Crudarach nicht verschwinden. Und ich ... ich habe noch nicht das Ende meines Pfads erreicht. Die Saat, die vor langer Zeit in die Erde gebracht wurde, muss sich noch entwickeln und die Blume der Wahrheit erst hervorbringen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yine de yuvamı korumalı, diğerleriyle omuz omuza ölmeliydim!" {n}Yrliet, kardeşlerinin yüzülmüş bedenlerine bakarken kendi ağzından dökülen sözlerle ürperiyor.{/n} "Crudarach'ın çocuklarından bir tanesi bile yaşadığı sürece hatırası zihinlerden silinmeyecek. Bense... Henüz Yolumun sonuna ulaşmadım. Uzun zaman önce dikilen tohum daha ağaç olamadı, hakikat çiçeğini daha açamadı."
languages.original_text: "But I could have protected my home and met my end alongside the others!" {n}Yrliet's own words make her shudder as she stares at the flayed bodies of her brothers and sisters.{/n} "Still, for as long as at least one child of Crudarach is alive, its memory will not vanish. And I... am yet to reach the end of my Path. The seed, planted long ago, is yet to grow and bring forth the flower of truth."

traits.locale_text: "Yine de yuvamı korumalıydım ve nihayetime diğerleriyle omuz omuza ermeliydim!" {n}Yrliet, kardeşlerinin yüzülmüş bedenlerine bakarken kendi ağzından dökülen sözlerle ürperiyor.{/n} "Crudarach'ın çocuklarından bir tanesi bile yaşadığı sürece hatırası zihinlerden silinmeyecek. Bense... Henüz Yolumun sonuna ulaşmadım. Uzun zaman önce dikilen tohum daha büyümedi, hakikat çiçeğini daha açmadı."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
